properties.name: Path
properties.expression: // lozengefunction midPoint(p1, p2, per) {    return [p1[0] + (p2[0] - p1[0]) * per, p1[1] + (p2[1] - p1[1]) * per];}function tangentsAbsolute(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = add(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function tangentsRelative(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = sub(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function flipX(point) {    return [-point[0], point[1]];}function flipArrayY (vertices, flipPoint) {    for (let i = 0; i < vertices.length; i++) {        vertices[i] = [vertices[i][0], flipPoint - (vertices[i][1] - flipPoint)]    }    return (vertices)}const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const scaleFacs = thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const dist = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('ikfkfreeksides').value[0]; const circ2 = thisLayer.effect('Holstein')('Upper Joint Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const circ1 = thisLayer.effect('Holstein')('Start Width') * scaleFacs *0.5;let c1, c2;if (circ2 < circ1) {	c2 = circ2, c1 = circ1	} else {	c1 = circ2, c2 = circ1	}const A = Math.acos(clamp((c1 - c2) / dist, -1, 1));const fac = 0.5522847498307933;const topSemiVerts = [[c2, -dist], [0, -dist - c2], [-c2, -dist]];const topSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c2 * fac), 0], [0, -c2 * fac]];const topSemiOuts = [[0, -c2 * fac], [-c2 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const quad = (0.5 * Math.PI);const t = linear(quad - A, 0, quad, 0, 1);const topSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiIns);const topSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiOuts);let Q0 = midPoint(topSemiVerts[0], topSemiOutsAbs[0], t);let Q1 = midPoint(topSemiOutsAbs[0], topSemiInsAbs[1], t);let Q2 = midPoint(topSemiInsAbs[1], topSemiVerts[1], t);let R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);let R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);let S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);let newTopSemiVerts = [S0, topSemiVerts[1], [-S0[0], S0[1]]];let newTopSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R0, Q2, flipX(R1)]);let newTopSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R1, flipX(Q2), flipX(R0)]);const botSemiVerts = [[c1, 0], [0, -c1], [-c1, 0]];const botSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c1 * fac), 0], [0, -c1 * fac]];const botSemiOuts = [[0, -c1 * fac], [-c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const remSemiVerts = [[-c1, 0], [0, c1], [c1, 0]];const remSemiIns = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, 0], [-(c1 * fac), 0], [0, c1 * fac]]);const remSemiOuts = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, c1 * fac], [c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]]);const botSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiIns);const botSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiOuts);Q0 = midPoint(botSemiVerts[0], botSemiOutsAbs[0], t);Q1 = midPoint(botSemiOutsAbs[0], botSemiInsAbs[1], t);Q2 = midPoint(botSemiInsAbs[1], botSemiVerts[1], t);R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);const newBotSemiVerts = [flipX(S0), remSemiVerts[0], remSemiVerts[1], remSemiVerts[2], S0]const newBotSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R1), flipX(Q0), remSemiIns[1], remSemiIns[2], R0])const newBotSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R0), remSemiOuts[0], remSemiOuts[1], Q0, R1])newTopSemiVerts.push(newBotSemiVerts[0], newBotSemiVerts[1], newBotSemiVerts[2], newBotSemiVerts[3], newBotSemiVerts[4]);newTopSemiIns.push(newBotSemiIns[0], newBotSemiIns[1], newBotSemiIns[2], newBotSemiIns[3], newBotSemiIns[4]);newTopSemiOuts.push(newBotSemiOuts[0], newBotSemiOuts[1], newBotSemiOuts[2], newBotSemiOuts[3], newBotSemiOuts[4]);let state;if (circ2 < circ1) {	state = 1;	} else {	state = 2;    newTopSemiVerts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiVerts, -dist * 0.5)    newTopSemiIns = flipArrayY(newTopSemiIns, 0)    newTopSemiOuts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiOuts, 0)}createPath(newTopSemiVerts, newTopSemiIns, newTopSemiOuts, true)

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: // lozengefunction midPoint(p1, p2, per) {    return [p1[0] + (p2[0] - p1[0]) * per, p1[1] + (p2[1] - p1[1]) * per];}function tangentsAbsolute(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = add(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function tangentsRelative(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = sub(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function flipX(point) {    return [-point[0], point[1]];}function flipArrayY (vertices, flipPoint) {    for (let i = 0; i < vertices.length; i++) {        vertices[i] = [vertices[i][0], flipPoint - (vertices[i][1] - flipPoint)]    }    return (vertices)}const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const scaleFacs = thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const dist = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('ikfkfreeksides').value[1]; const circ2 = thisLayer.effect('Holstein')('Lower Joint Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const circ1 = thisLayer.effect('Holstein')('Upper Joint Width') * scaleFacs *0.5;let c1, c2;if (circ2 < circ1) {	c2 = circ2, c1 = circ1	} else {	c1 = circ2, c2 = circ1	}const A = Math.acos(clamp((c1 - c2) / dist, -1, 1));const fac = 0.5522847498307933;const topSemiVerts = [[c2, -dist], [0, -dist - c2], [-c2, -dist]];const topSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c2 * fac), 0], [0, -c2 * fac]];const topSemiOuts = [[0, -c2 * fac], [-c2 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const quad = (0.5 * Math.PI);const t = linear(quad - A, 0, quad, 0, 1);const topSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiIns);const topSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiOuts);let Q0 = midPoint(topSemiVerts[0], topSemiOutsAbs[0], t);let Q1 = midPoint(topSemiOutsAbs[0], topSemiInsAbs[1], t);let Q2 = midPoint(topSemiInsAbs[1], topSemiVerts[1], t);let R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);let R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);let S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);let newTopSemiVerts = [S0, topSemiVerts[1], [-S0[0], S0[1]]];let newTopSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R0, Q2, flipX(R1)]);let newTopSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R1, flipX(Q2), flipX(R0)]);const botSemiVerts = [[c1, 0], [0, -c1], [-c1, 0]];const botSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c1 * fac), 0], [0, -c1 * fac]];const botSemiOuts = [[0, -c1 * fac], [-c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const remSemiVerts = [[-c1, 0], [0, c1], [c1, 0]];const remSemiIns = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, 0], [-(c1 * fac), 0], [0, c1 * fac]]);const remSemiOuts = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, c1 * fac], [c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]]);const botSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiIns);const botSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiOuts);Q0 = midPoint(botSemiVerts[0], botSemiOutsAbs[0], t);Q1 = midPoint(botSemiOutsAbs[0], botSemiInsAbs[1], t);Q2 = midPoint(botSemiInsAbs[1], botSemiVerts[1], t);R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);const newBotSemiVerts = [flipX(S0), remSemiVerts[0], remSemiVerts[1], remSemiVerts[2], S0]const newBotSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R1), flipX(Q0), remSemiIns[1], remSemiIns[2], R0])const newBotSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R0), remSemiOuts[0], remSemiOuts[1], Q0, R1])newTopSemiVerts.push(newBotSemiVerts[0], newBotSemiVerts[1], newBotSemiVerts[2], newBotSemiVerts[3], newBotSemiVerts[4]);newTopSemiIns.push(newBotSemiIns[0], newBotSemiIns[1], newBotSemiIns[2], newBotSemiIns[3], newBotSemiIns[4]);newTopSemiOuts.push(newBotSemiOuts[0], newBotSemiOuts[1], newBotSemiOuts[2], newBotSemiOuts[3], newBotSemiOuts[4]);let state;if (circ2 < circ1) {	state = 1;	} else {	state = 2;    newTopSemiVerts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiVerts, -dist * 0.5)    newTopSemiIns = flipArrayY(newTopSemiIns, 0)    newTopSemiOuts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiOuts, 0)}createPath(newTopSemiVerts, newTopSemiIns, newTopSemiOuts, true)

properties.name: Path
properties.expression: // lozengefunction midPoint(p1, p2, per) {    return [p1[0] + (p2[0] - p1[0]) * per, p1[1] + (p2[1] - p1[1]) * per];}function tangentsAbsolute(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = add(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function tangentsRelative(vertices, tans) {    for (let i = 0, il = vertices.length; i < il; i++) {        tans[i] = sub(tans[i], vertices[i]);    }    return tans;}function flipX(point) {    return [-point[0], point[1]];}function flipArrayY (vertices, flipPoint) {    for (let i = 0; i < vertices.length; i++) {        vertices[i] = [vertices[i][0], flipPoint - (vertices[i][1] - flipPoint)]    }    return (vertices)}const endctrl = thisComp.layer('{{ end }}');const scaleFacs = thisLayer.content('Admin').content('Scaling Factors').transform.scale[0];const dist = endctrl.effect('Pseudo/skl_3bone_data_01')('ikfkfreeksides').value[2]; const circ2 = thisLayer.effect('Holstein')('End Width') * scaleFacs * 0.5;const circ1 = thisLayer.effect('Holstein')('Lower Joint Width') * scaleFacs *0.5;let c1, c2;if (circ2 < circ1) {	c2 = circ2, c1 = circ1	} else {	c1 = circ2, c2 = circ1	}const A = Math.acos(clamp((c1 - c2) / dist, -1, 1));const fac = 0.5522847498307933;const topSemiVerts = [[c2, -dist], [0, -dist - c2], [-c2, -dist]];const topSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c2 * fac), 0], [0, -c2 * fac]];const topSemiOuts = [[0, -c2 * fac], [-c2 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const quad = (0.5 * Math.PI);const t = linear(quad - A, 0, quad, 0, 1);const topSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiIns);const topSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(topSemiVerts, topSemiOuts);let Q0 = midPoint(topSemiVerts[0], topSemiOutsAbs[0], t);let Q1 = midPoint(topSemiOutsAbs[0], topSemiInsAbs[1], t);let Q2 = midPoint(topSemiInsAbs[1], topSemiVerts[1], t);let R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);let R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);let S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);let newTopSemiVerts = [S0, topSemiVerts[1], [-S0[0], S0[1]]];let newTopSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R0, Q2, flipX(R1)]);let newTopSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newTopSemiVerts, [R1, flipX(Q2), flipX(R0)]);const botSemiVerts = [[c1, 0], [0, -c1], [-c1, 0]];const botSemiIns = [[0, 0], [(c1 * fac), 0], [0, -c1 * fac]];const botSemiOuts = [[0, -c1 * fac], [-c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]];const remSemiVerts = [[-c1, 0], [0, c1], [c1, 0]];const remSemiIns = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, 0], [-(c1 * fac), 0], [0, c1 * fac]]);const remSemiOuts = tangentsAbsolute(remSemiVerts, [[0, c1 * fac], [c1 * fac, 0], [0, 0]]);const botSemiInsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiIns);const botSemiOutsAbs = tangentsAbsolute(botSemiVerts, botSemiOuts);Q0 = midPoint(botSemiVerts[0], botSemiOutsAbs[0], t);Q1 = midPoint(botSemiOutsAbs[0], botSemiInsAbs[1], t);Q2 = midPoint(botSemiInsAbs[1], botSemiVerts[1], t);R0 = midPoint(Q0, Q1, t);R1 = midPoint(Q1, Q2, t);S0 = midPoint(R0, R1, t);const newBotSemiVerts = [flipX(S0), remSemiVerts[0], remSemiVerts[1], remSemiVerts[2], S0]const newBotSemiIns = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R1), flipX(Q0), remSemiIns[1], remSemiIns[2], R0])const newBotSemiOuts = tangentsRelative(newBotSemiVerts, [flipX(R0), remSemiOuts[0], remSemiOuts[1], Q0, R1])newTopSemiVerts.push(newBotSemiVerts[0], newBotSemiVerts[1], newBotSemiVerts[2], newBotSemiVerts[3], newBotSemiVerts[4]);newTopSemiIns.push(newBotSemiIns[0], newBotSemiIns[1], newBotSemiIns[2], newBotSemiIns[3], newBotSemiIns[4]);newTopSemiOuts.push(newBotSemiOuts[0], newBotSemiOuts[1], newBotSemiOuts[2], newBotSemiOuts[3], newBotSemiOuts[4]);let state;if (circ2 < circ1) {	state = 1;	} else {	state = 2;    newTopSemiVerts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiVerts, -dist * 0.5)    newTopSemiIns = flipArrayY(newTopSemiIns, 0)    newTopSemiOuts = flipArrayY(newTopSemiOuts, 0)}createPath(newTopSemiVerts, newTopSemiIns, newTopSemiOuts, true)

properties.name: Scale
Position
properties.expression: let val = [0, 0];if (thisLayer.hasParent) {	val = thisLayer.parent.fromWorld([0, 0, 0])	};[val[0], val[1], 0];

properties.name: Scale
properties.expression: let val = [100, 100]if (thisLayer.hasParent) {    const ctrlScaleFactor = Math.max(length(thisLayer.toComp([0,0]), thisLayer.toComp([0.7071,0.7071])), 0.0001);    val = [value[0] / ctrlScaleFactor, value[1] / ctrlScaleFactor]}val

properties.name: Rotation
properties.expression: let val = 0;if (thisLayer.hasParent) {    const vec = thisLayer.parent.toWorldVec([1, 0, 0]);    val = -radiansToDegrees(Math.atan2(vec[1], vec[0]))}val
